channel.title: 317 deob mopar's client
channel.description:
Hey, I'm currently using Mopar's renamed 317 deob.
By default it cannot be setup web applet usage. It works perfectly fine when I jar and sign it, but when one tries to use the webclient it throws this error; java.lang:reflect.invocationtargetexception
I thought perhaps I had done something to the client that would make it throw the error so I tried and sign a completely untouched deob and it threw the same error, I also tried and sign Galkon's refactored client and it worked perfectly fine.
Does anyone know what edits I'll have to make for it to work as a webclient?

item.title: 317 deob mopar's client
item.dc:creator: @sponjebubu sponjebubu
item.description:
@sponjebubu wrote:

Hey, I’m currently using Mopar’s renamed 317 deob.

By default it cannot be setup web applet usage. It works perfectly fine when I jar and sign it, but when one tries to use the webclient it throws this error; java.lang:reflect.invocationtargetexception

I thought perhaps I had done something to the client that would make it throw the error so I tried and sign a completely untouched deob and it threw the same error, I also tried and sign Galkon’s refactored client and it worked perfectly fine.

Does anyone know what edits I’ll have to make for it to work as a webclient?
